TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PolicyLevel extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PolicyLevel extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed PolicyLevel extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示公共语言运行时的安全策略级别。

span.span: Represents the security policy levels for the common language runtime.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 正在离开为计算机提供安全策略。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime (CLR) is moving away from providing security policy for computers. 建议使用 [Windows 软件限制策略 (SRP) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101) 或 [AppLocker](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) 作为 CLR 安全策略的替换。We recommend that you use [Windows Software Restriction Policies (SRP)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101) or [AppLocker](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) as a replacement for CLR security policy. 本主题中的信息适用于 .NET Framework 版本3.5 及更早版本;它不适用于 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 和更高版本。The information in this topic applies to the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier; it does not apply to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and later. 有关此更改以及其他更改的详细信息，请参阅 [安全更改](/dotnet/framework/security/security-changes)。For more information about this and other changes, see [Security Changes](/dotnet/framework/security/security-changes). 安全策略的最高级别是企业范围内的。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 层次结构的后续较低级别表示进一步的策略限制，但绝不能授予比更高级别允许的权限更多的权限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 实现以下策略级别：The following policy levels are implemented: 1. Enterprise：企业中所有托管代码的安全策略。Enterprise: Security policy for all managed code in an enterprise. 2. 计算机：在计算机上运行的所有托管代码的安全策略。Machine: Security policy for all managed code run on the computer. 3. User：用户运行的所有托管代码的安全策略。User: Security policy for all managed code run by the user. 4. 应用程序域：应用程序中所有托管代码的安全策略。Application domain: Security policy for all managed code in an application. 策略级别由一组组织为一个根根树的代码组组成 (参阅 ) ，这是代码组引用的一组命名权限集，用于指定要授予代码组代码的权限以及完全受信任的程序集的列表。A policy level consists of a set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree (see ), a set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group, and a list of fully-trusted assemblies. 用于 枚举策略级别。Use to enumerate the policy levels.

summary.span: 将 添加到 对象列表中，这些对象用于确定程序集是否为不应评估的程序集组的成员。

[System.Obsolete("All GACed assemblies are now fully trusted and all permissions now succeed on fully trusted code.")]
[<System.Obsolete("All GACed assemblies are now fully trusted and all permissions now succeed on fully trusted code.")>]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 使用 "AppDomain" 创建一个新的 。This method creates a new with the "AppDomain". 新的 将最初包含与 默认计算机策略相同的对象，并且将具有授予所有代码的单个根代码组 `FullTrust` 。The new will initially contain the same objects as in the default computer policy, and will have a single root code group that grants `FullTrust` to all code.

summary.span: 获取 对象列表，这些对象用于确定程序集是否为用于评估安全策略的程序集组的成员。

value.span: 对象列表，这些对象用于确定程序集是否为用于评估安全策略的程序集组的成员。

span.span: A list of objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies used to evaluate security policy.

value.span: 在对列表中没有的程序集进行安全策略评估的过程中，这些程序集被授予完全信任。

span.span: These assemblies are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在不在列表中的程序集的安全策略评估过程中被授予完全信任，但当安全策略系统直接评估时，它们不会被自动授予完全信任。 are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list, but are not automatically granted full trust when directly evaluated by the security policy system. .NET Framework 版本2.0 或更高版本中不支持属性，因为这些版本中未使用完全信任程序集的列表。The property is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Recover() cil managed

summary.span: 用上一次的备份（反映上一次保存之前的策略状态）替换此 的配置文件，并将它返回到上一次保存的状态。

span.span: Replaces the configuration file for this with the last backup (reflecting the state of policy prior to the last time it was saved) and returns it to the state of the last save.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会修改当前的 。This method does not make modifications to the current . 相反，它会更新 对象的文件和 安全系统用于评估策略的。Instead, it updates the object's file and the that the security system uses to evaluate policy. 此方法由 "caspol.exe-恢复" 选项使用 (参阅 [Caspol.exe (代码访问安全策略 ") ](/dotnet/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool)) "。This method is used by the caspol -recover option (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool)).

exception.span: 该策略级别没有有效的配置文件。

span.span: The policy level does not have a valid configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public Function Resolve (evidence As Evidence) As PolicyStatement

span.span: The used to resolve the .

summary.span: 根据策略级别的证据移除策略，并返回产生的 。

span.span: Resolves policy based on evidence for the policy level, and returns the resulting .
The resulting .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是策略级别的基本策略评估操作。 is the basic policy evaluation operation for policy levels. 给定一组证据作为输入，此方法会从根开始测试代码组的成员身份条件，并按匹配进行处理。Given a set of evidence as input, this method tests membership conditions of code groups starting at the root and working down as matched. 匹配代码组生成的权限组合将生成一个返回的 。The combination of permissions resulting from the matching code groups produces a that is returned. 在授予对代码的权限时，安全策略将为所有适用的策略级别使用已解析的策略语句，并为权限提供代码请求。In granting permissions to code, security policy uses the resolved policy statements for all applicable policy levels, together with the code request for permissions. ## Examples 下面的代码演示方法的用法 。The following code shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CPP/policylevel.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CS/policylevel.cs#13)] [!code-vb[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/VB/policylevel.vb#13)]

exception.span: 策略级别包含多个标记为独占的匹配代码组。

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.
The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public Function ResolveMatchingCodeGroups (evidence As Evidence) As CodeGroup

span.span: The used to resolve policy.

summary.span: 解析策略级别的策略并返回与证据匹配的代码组树的根。

span.span: Resolves policy at the policy level and returns the root of a code group tree that matches the evidence.

returns.span: ，表示与指定证据匹配的代码组树的根。

span.span: A representing the root of a tree of code groups matching the specified evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来分析策略级别中与一组特定证据相关的代码组的影响。You can use this method to analyze the effect of the code groups in a policy level with respect to a certain set of evidence. 例如，如果安全策略未向程序集授予其所需的最低代码请求权限，则很难通过检查代码组是否准确指出了问题所在。For example, if the security policy is not granting an assembly the minimum code request permissions it needs, it can be difficult to tell by examination of the code groups exactly where the problem is. 由于此方法返回可具有子代码组的代码组，因此管理员可以检查代码组及其子代码组，并确定哪些代码组匹配。Since this method returns a code group that can have child code groups, it is possible for an administrator to examine the code group and its child code groups and determine which code groups match.

exception.span: 策略级别包含多个标记为独占的匹配代码组。

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.
The parameter is .

summary.span: 获取策略级别的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the policy level.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全策略的最高级别是企业范围内的。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 层次结构的后续较低级别表示进一步的策略限制，但绝不能授予比更高级别允许的权限更多的权限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 以下是策略级别的顺序。The policy levels in order are the following. 1. EnterpriseEnterprise 2. 计算机Machine 3. 用户User 4. 应用程序域Application domain 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .
